title: Cellular 4G/5G Firmware Data Science & Machine Learning Engineer
summary: Do you have a passion for invention and self-challenge? Do you thrive with pushing the limits of what’s considered feasible? As part of a world-class modem team, you’ll craft sophisticated innovative embedded firmware that delivers more performance in our products than ever before! Join us, and you’ll help us innovate new wireless systems technologies.
description: Data Science & Machine Learning Engineer will be responsible for developing state-of-the-art data processing pipeline based on machine learning models and leveraging data science algorithms to parse substantial data and logs in a timely manner.
preferred_qualifications: Ph.D. degree in Data Science or Computer Science, Proficient Python developer with 5+ years validated programming skills, Proven understanding of machine learning, deep learning and natural language processing, Experience in developing machine learning models and more.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. The base pay range for this role is between $135,400 and $250,600, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs.
